review: was not for me  i have  fire tv  but worked great
author: manuel yniguez

review: Love this Stick! Other family members have the Fire TV so I'm used to using it. This Stick works just as well for standard viewing and I haven't missed the voice controls at all. Can highly recommend!
author: MJ Harrison "MJ Harrison"

review: I've had a lot of issues with WiFi cutting out, even though the computer and phone sitting next to it can stream just fine. Otherwise, I love it. No regrets.
author: Kelly Grantham

review: Haven't really checked it out  a whole lot yet ,  but hooking it up was a piece of cake. And unlike my other electronic entertainment ,  all you do is hit the remote and it connects to the right impute itself
author: Ann

review: I am a Movie and a history Buff. The movies I can see now for free are awesome!!! Thank You.
author: Richard D. Bean

review: The Firestick was very easy to install and it works fine. It's a lot faster and less expensive than the other streaming device on my living room TV (an RCA box). I would recommend to others for ease and convenience of operation. I love it when something does what it's supposed to do!
author: Pete Scaltrito

review: I figured I'd try the fire stick because I've been wanting to make the break from cable.So far I've been streaming Netflix and Amazon Prime selections, and I think I'm falling in love with this thing and very soon I'll be unplugging from the over priced cable masters.
author: Ronault D. Trowbridge

review: Too many movies that either you have to purchase or rent. Not enough of the movies are free to watch like on Netflix. Kind of a disappointment.
author: cdicki
